content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal preferences; however, many people consider Troy Baker's role as Joel from The Last of Us as one of his most iconic and emotional performances. The character's depth and range of emotions, as well as the game's story and writing, made Joel one of the most beloved characters in recent video game history. In addition, his portrayal of Booker DeWitt in BioShock Infinite and The Joker in Batman: Arkham Origins has also been highly praised by critics and gamers alike.
